about_the_game:
Welcome to the mysterious world of the lake, surrounded by darkness and mystery. In this two—person cooperative survival game, you will take on the role of hunters tasked with exploring wild surroundings and tracking down a mysterious Rake creature.

Game Features

  • Cooperative for two: Work as a team to survive in difficult conditions. Coordinate your actions, share your gear, and cover for each other.

  • Dynamic environment: The surroundings of the lake are constantly changing — dynamic weather, noise and darkness create an atmosphere of constant tension.

  • Rake is a cunning hunter: The creature doesn't just wait for you to find it. It preys on you, learns your weaknesses and attacks at the most unexpected moment.

  • Choosing tactics: Collect resources, set traps, and use the environment to outsmart Rake.

  • Stress and survival: Limited resources and a constant sense of danger will force you to plan every action carefully.

Plot

You two are experienced anomaly hunters hired by the locals after a series of mysterious disappearances near the lake. However, the deeper you get into the forest, the more you realize that the Rake is not just a predator. It's a creature that guards something darker.

Are you ready to risk everything for the sake of completing the mission? Or will the lake become your last resting place?

Immerse yourself in the adrenaline-fueled atmosphere of "Rake: The Lake" and find out who will be the winner in this survival game.
